about_the_game:
In a galaxy overflowing with bounty hunters, the planet "Klook Foon" hosts the secret guild "Hunter Haven." Only the elite gather here to review the wanted board, filled with the galaxy's most dangerous criminals. The guild master remains anonymous, while "Redd," an ex-hunter turned bartender, provides crucial clues and rewards for capturing targets.

Recently, the guild master has become a villain, manipulating and exploiting the hunters. Seeing the corruption, Redd seeks a bounty hunter capable of capturing the guild master and taking his place as the new leader.

Hunters often join forces to track the same target, driven by greed and the lure of rich rewards. But alliances are fragile. At crucial moments, trust shatters, revealing their true nature—there is no honor among them. Each vies to claim the prize, ready to betray their comrades.

Welcome to Bounty Brawl, where the hunt is fierce, and betrayal is inevitable. Can you rise to the top, or will greed and deceit consume you? Who will be the one to bring down the corrupt guild master and claim the throne of Hunter Haven?

Dive into Bounty Brawl and discover a diverse array of bounty hunters, each offering unique playstyles, weapons, and abilities. Whether you prefer swift close-combat, precise long-range attacks, or powerful grenades, there's a hunter for every strategy. Driven by greed and cunning, these hunters must navigate alliances and deception to claim their rewards. Choose your favorite, master their skills, and outwit your rivals in the ultimate hunt for glory and loot.

Gathering in the Hunter Haven Guild, players can choose their hunter and prepare for the next hunt by selecting a criminal from the wanted board. Each mission takes you to different planets where notorious criminals are hiding. With their chosen hunter, players embark on thrilling hunts, navigating diverse and treacherous worlds to capture their targets and claim the bounty. Prepare yourself, strategize, and outwit both your enemies and fellow hunters.

Players embark on a hunt mission alongside other bounty hunters, navigating through a room-by-room progression filled with random elements. Each area presents unique challenges with randomized environments, enemies, and objectives. Players must complete these objectives to advance to the next area. With every mission offering a new and unpredictable experience, strategy and adaptability are key to overcoming the challenges and outmaneuvering both foes and fellow hunters.

Every hunter is equipped with a lasso, an essential tool for survival and success. This versatile device allows hunters to overcome obstacles, leap across gaps, and capture wanted enemies. But that's not all – in the heat of competition, you can even use your lasso to capture other bounty hunters and claim the bounty for yourself. Master the lasso to navigate the environment, outsmart your rivals, and secure your place as the top hunter in Bounty Brawl.

After each hunt area, you'll find the Black Market, where you'll meet Imen, the Contraband Smuggler. Imen provides a variety of upgrades, offering perks that cater to different playstyles. Players can buy and upgrade themselves to gain an edge in the hunt. However, there's a catch – only one of each perk is available. If someone else buys it first, it's gone. So, act fast and choose wisely to enhance your hunter's abilities and stay ahead of the competition.

In the final stage of the hunt, players must band together to face the wanted criminal (Boss). Each boss presents a unique challenge that requires teamwork and strategy to overcome. Remember, your lasso is your best friend, helping you navigate the battlefield, avoid deadly attacks, and capture the criminal. Work together, utilize your lasso skills, and bring the boss to justice to claim the ultimate reward.

After defeating the boss, the ultimate challenge begins. All hunters turn against each other in a fierce battle to claim the most rewards for themselves. Trust shatters, alliances break, and it’s every hunter for themselves. Use your skills, strategy, and cunning to outmaneuver and outfight your rivals. Only the strongest and most devious hunter will emerge victorious and walk away with the ultimate bounty. Prepare for the final showdown where only one can claim the top prize.

name: Bounty Brawl: Most Wanted

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10(64-bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i3-10100 or AMD equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1050 Ti or AMD RX570
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 5 GB available space

dejus.descriptors:

Linguagem imprópria
Atos criminosos
